actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Commerce to sell the obsolete vessel U.S.S. COMSTOCK (LSD-19) to Pacific Marine, a United States company, for conversion for operation under the American flag, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Commerce to sell a certain vessel to a named United States company for conversion for operation under the American flag.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Commerce to sell the obsolete vessel U.S.S. COMSTOCK (LSD-19) to Pacific Marine, a United States company, for conversion for operation under the American flag, and for other purposes.
